description.en: event fired when the control is displayed on a non HTML5 compliant browser

description.en:
Occurs just after the current Map's grid area rectangle is changed.
The grid area may change as the result of the Map being resized.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.map to get reference to map object.
Use ui.newHeight to get new height value.
Use ui.newLeft to get new left value.
Use ui.newTop to get new top value.
Use ui.newWidth to get new top value.
Use ui.oldHeight to get old height value.
Use ui.oldLeft to get old left value.
Use ui.oldTop to get old top value.
Use ui.oldWidth to get old top value.
description.jp:
Occurs just after the current Map's grid area rectangle is changed.
The grid area may change as the result of the Map being resized.

Use ui.map to get reference to map object.
Use ui.newHeight to get new height value.
Use ui.newLeft to get new left value.
Use ui.newTop to get new top value.
Use ui.newWidth to get new top value.
Use ui.oldHeight to get old height value.
Use ui.oldLeft to get old left value.
Use ui.oldTop to get old top value.
Use ui.oldWidth to get old top value.

description.en:
Gets or sets the template to use for circle markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of circle.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the template to use for circle markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of circle.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en:
Gets or sets the cross hair point (in world coordinates)
Either or both of the crosshair point's X and Y may be set to double.NaN, in which
case the relevant crosshair line is hidden.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the cross hair point (in world coordinates)
Either or both of the crosshair point's X and Y may be set to double.NaN, in which
case the relevant crosshair line is hidden.

description.en: The x coordinate.
description.jp: The x coordinate.

description.en: The y coordinate.
description.jp: The y coordinate.

description.en: Gets or sets the current Map's crosshair visibility override.
description.jp: Gets or sets the current Map's crosshair visibility override.

description.en: Crosshair should be visible.
description.jp: Crosshair should be visible.

description.en: Crosshair should not be visible.
description.jp: Crosshair should not be visible.

description.en: can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself
description.jp: can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself

description.en: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.
description.jp: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

description.en: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it
description.jp: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it

description.en: Gets or sets the DefaultInteraction property. The default interaction state defines the map's response to mouse events.
description.jp: Gets or sets the DefaultInteraction property. The default interaction state defines the map's response to mouse events.

description.en: User gesture will not change the state of the map.
description.jp: User gesture will not change the state of the map.

description.en: User gesture will start a drag rectangle to zoom the map.
description.jp: User gesture will start a drag rectangle to zoom the map.

description.en: User gesture will start a pan action to move the map's window.
description.jp: User gesture will start a pan action to move the map's window.

description.en:
Gets or sets the preview rectangle.
The preview rectangle may be set to Rect.Empty, in which case the visible preview
strokePath is hidden.
The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the preview rectangle.
The preview rectangle may be set to Rect.Empty, in which case the visible preview
strokePath is hidden.
The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.

description.en: see $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

description.en: an array of series objects
description.jp: an array of series objects

description.en: Gets or sets the x-radius of the ellipse that is used to round the corners of the column.
description.jp: Gets or sets the x-radius of the ellipse that is used to round the corners of the column.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use for the series.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use for the series.

description.en: Gets or sets whether to clip the series to the bounds. Setting this to true can affect performance.
description.jp: Gets or sets whether to clip the series to the bounds. Setting this to true can affect performance.

description.en: Gets or sets the close mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the close mapping property for the current series object.

description.en: The name of the property on each data item containing a numeric value which can be converted to a color by the ColorScale.
description.jp: The name of the property on each data item containing a numeric value which can be converted to a color by the ColorScale.

description.en: The ColorScale used to resolve the color values of points in the series.
description.jp: The ColorScale used to resolve the color values of points in the series.

description.en: String The database source URI.

description.en: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.
description.jp: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.

description.jp: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it.

description.en: Gets or sets the DiscreteLegendItemTemplate property. The legend item control content is created according to the DiscreteLegendItemTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.
description.jp: Gets or sets the DiscreteLegendItemTemplate property. The legend item control content is created according to the DiscreteLegendItemTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.

description.en: The name of the property on data source items which contains a numeric value to convert to a Brush using the FillScale.
description.jp: The name of the property on data source items which contains a numeric value to convert to a Brush using the FillScale.

description.en: The ValueBrushScale to use when determining Brushes for each Shape, based on the values found in FillMemberPath.
description.jp: The ValueBrushScale to use when determining Brushes for each Shape, based on the values found in FillMemberPath.

description.en: Gets or sets the value that maps to the maximum heat color.
description.jp: Gets or sets the value that maps to the maximum heat color.

description.en: Gets or sets the density value that maps to the minimum heat color.
description.jp: Gets or sets the density value that maps to the minimum heat color.

description.en: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

description.en: Gets or sets the number of values to hide at the beginning of the indicator.
description.jp: Gets or sets the number of values to hide at the beginning of the indicator.

description.en: Gets or sets the Label mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the Label mapping property for the current series object.

description.en: The name of the property of data source items which contains the latitude coordinate of the symbol.
description.jp: The name of the property of data source items which contains the latitude coordinate of the symbol.

description.en: Gets or sets the LegendItemBadgeTemplate property. The legend item badge is created according to the LegendItemBadgeTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.
description.jp: Gets or sets the LegendItemBadgeTemplate property. The legend item badge is created according to the LegendItemBadgeTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.

description.en: Gets or sets the LegendItemTemplate property..
description.jp: Gets or sets the LegendItemTemplate property..

description.en: The name of the property of data source items which contains the longitude coordinate of the symbol.
description.jp: The name of the property of data source items which contains the longitude coordinate of the symbol.

description.en: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for long AVO periods is 30.
description.jp: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for long AVO periods is 30.

description.en: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

description.jp: Gets or sets the MarkerCollisionAvoidance .

description.jp: No collision avoidance is attempted.

description.jp: Markers that collide will be omitted.

description.jp: Markers that collide will be faded in opacity.

description.en: Markers that collide may be shifted or omitted.

description.jp: Gets or sets the maximum number of markerItems displayed by the current series. If more than the specified number of markerItems are visible, the series will automatically choose a representative set.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the series. Some series types, such as LineSeries, do not display outlines.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the series. Some series types, such as LineSeries, do not display outlines.

description.en: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator periods is 14.
description.jp: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator periods is 14.

description.en: Gets or sets the whether to progressively load the data into the map.
description.jp: Gets or sets the whether to progressively load the data into the map.

description.en: Gets or sets the radius mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the radius mapping property for the current series object.

description.en: Gets or sets the radius size scale for the bubbles.
description.jp: Gets or sets the radius size scale for the bubbles.

description.en: Set to true in order to have an existing series removed from the map, by name.
description.jp: Set to true in order to have an existing series removed from the map, by name.

description.en: Gets or sets the current series object's rendering resolution.
description.jp: Gets or sets the current series object's rendering resolution.

description.en: See $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.
description.jp: See $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

description.en: The triangulated file source URI or an instance of $.ig.ShapeDataSource.
description.jp: The triangulated file source URI or an instance of $.ig.ShapeDataSource.

description.en: Gets or sets the resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the shapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.
description.jp: Gets or sets the resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the shapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.

description.en: The name of the property on data source items which, for each shape, contains a list of points to be converted to a polygon. To be consistent with the Shapefile technical description, it is expected that each list of points is defined as an IEnumerable of IEnumerable of Point, or in other words, a list of lists of points.
description.jp: The name of the property on data source items which, for each shape, contains a list of points to be converted to a polygon. To be consistent with the Shapefile technical description, it is expected that each list of points is defined as an IEnumerable of IEnumerable of Point, or in other words, a list of lists of points.

description.en: The default style to apply to all Shapes in the series.
description.jp: The default style to apply to all Shapes in the series.

description.en: The StyleSelector which is used to select a style for each Shape.
description.jp: The StyleSelector which is used to select a style for each Shape.

description.en: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for short AVO periods is 10.
description.jp: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for short AVO periods is 10.

description.en: Whether the map should render a tooltip.
description.jp: Whether the map should render a tooltip.

description.en: Defines the spline type
description.jp: Defines the spline type

description.en: Calculates the spline using a natural spline calculation formula.
description.jp: Calculates the spline using a natural spline calculation formula.

description.en: Calculated the spline using a clamped spline calculation formula.
description.jp: Calculated the spline using a clamped spline calculation formula.

description.en: Gets or sets the Stiffness property.
description.jp: Gets or sets the Stiffness property.

description.en: Gets or sets the width of the current series object's line thickness.
description.jp: Gets or sets the width of the current series object's line thickness.

description.en: Gets or sets the Title property. The legend item control is created according to the Title on-demand by the series object itself.
description.jp: Gets or sets the Title property. The legend item control is created according to the Title on-demand by the series object itself.

description.en: Gets or sets the duration of the current series's morph.
description.jp: Gets or sets the duration of the current series's morph.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use to draw the trend line.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use to draw the trend line.

description.en: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current scatter series object. The typical, and initial, value for trend line period is 7.
description.jp: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current scatter series object. The typical, and initial, value for trend line period is 7.

description.en: Gets or sets the thickness of the current scatter series object's trend line.
description.jp: Gets or sets the thickness of the current scatter series object's trend line.

description.en: Gets or sets the trend line type.
description.jp: Gets or sets the trend line type.

description.en: There isn't a type
description.jp: There isn't a type

description.en: The type is set to a linearFit
description.jp: The type is set to a linearFit

description.en: The type is set to a quadraticFit
description.jp: The type is set to a quadraticFit

description.en: The type is set to a cubicFit
description.jp: The type is set to a cubicFit

description.en: The type is set to a quarticFit
description.jp: The type is set to a quarticFit

description.en: The type is set to a quinticFit
description.jp: The type is set to a quinticFit

description.en: The type is set to a logarithmicFit
description.jp: The type is set to a logarithmicFit

description.en: The type is set to a exponentialFit
description.jp: The type is set to a exponentialFit

description.en: The type is set to a powerLawFit
description.jp: The type is set to a powerLawFit

description.en: The type is set to a simpleAverage
description.jp: The type is set to a simpleAverage

description.en: The type is set to a exponentialAverage
description.jp: The type is set to a exponentialAverage

description.en: The type is set to a modifiedAverage
description.jp: The type is set to a modifiedAverage

description.en: The type is set to a cumulativeAverage
description.jp: The type is set to a cumulativeAverage

description.en: The type is set to a weightedAverage
description.jp: The type is set to a weightedAverage

description.en: The source of triangulation data. This property is optional. If it is left as null, the triangulation will be created based on the items in the data source. Triangulation is a demanding operation, so the runtime performance will be better when specifying a TriangulationSource, especially when a large number of data items are present.
description.jp: The source of triangulation data. This property is optional. If it is left as null, the triangulation will be created based on the items in the data source. Triangulation is a demanding operation, so the runtime performance will be better when specifying a TriangulationSource, especially when a large number of data items are present.

description.en: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the first vertex point in the data source.
description.jp: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the first vertex point in the data source.

description.en: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the second vertex point in the data source.
description.jp: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the second vertex point in the data source.

description.en: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the third vertex point in the data source.
description.jp: The name of the property of the TrianglesSource items which, for each triangle, contains the index of the third vertex point in the data source.

description.en: The triangulated file source URI or an instance of $.ig.TriangulationDataSource.
description.jp: The triangulated file source URI or an instance of $.ig.TriangulationDataSource.

description.en: Type of the series.
description.jp: Type of the series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Symbol Series series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Symbol Series series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Poly Line series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Poly Line series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Scatter Area series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Scatter Area series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Shape series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Shape series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Contour Line series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Contour Line series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic High Density Scatter series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic High Density Scatter series.

description.en: Specify the series as geographic Proportional Size series.
description.jp: Specify the series as geographic Proportional Size series.

description.en: Determines how unknown values will be plotted on the map. Null and Double.NaN are two examples of unknown values.
description.jp: Determines how unknown values will be plotted on the map. Null and Double.NaN are two examples of unknown values.

description.en: Plot the unknown value as the midpoint between surrounding known values using linear interpolation.
description.jp: Plot the unknown value as the midpoint between surrounding known values using linear interpolation.

description.en: Do not plot the unknown value on the map.
description.jp: Do not plot the unknown value on the map.

description.en: Gets or sets the whether to use use brute force mode.
description.jp: Gets or sets the whether to use use brute force mode.

description.en: Gets or sets whether Cartesian Interpolation should be used rather than Archimedian spiral based interpolation.
description.jp: Gets or sets whether Cartesian Interpolation should be used rather than Archimedian spiral based interpolation.

description.en: Gets or sets the whether to use squares when halting a render traversal rather than the shape of the coalesced area.
description.jp: Gets or sets the whether to use squares when halting a render traversal rather than the shape of the coalesced area.

description.en: Gets or sets the item path that provides the values for the current series.
description.jp: Gets or sets the item path that provides the values for the current series.

description.en: Gets or sets the ContourValueResolver used to determine the numeric values of contours.
description.jp: Gets or sets the ContourValueResolver used to determine the numeric values of contours.

description.en: The minimum scale at which this series becomes visible. The default value for this property is 1.0, which means the series will always be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.0, the series will never be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.5, the series will be visible as long as the map is zoomed in to at least 200%.
description.jp: The minimum scale at which this series becomes visible. The default value for this property is 1.0, which means the series will always be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.0, the series will never be visible. At a VisibleFromScale setting of 0.5, the series will be visible as long as the map is zoomed in to at least 200%.

description.en: Gets or sets the volume mapping property for the current series object.
description.jp: Gets or sets the volume mapping property for the current series object.

description.en:
Gets or sets the template to use for square markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of square.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the template to use for square markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of square.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en:
Gets or sets the template to use for tetragram markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of tetragram.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the template to use for tetragram markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of tetragram.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en: The swatch used to style this widget
description.jp: The swatch used to style this widget

description.en:
Gets or sets the template to use for triangle markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of triangle.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the template to use for triangle markers on the map.
Defines the marker template used for
series with a marker type of triangle.
The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en: The width of the map. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The width of the map. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the horizontal scroll.
This property is effectively a shortcut to the X position of the WindowRect property.
description.jp:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the horizontal scroll.
This property is effectively a shortcut to the X position of the WindowRect property.

description.en:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the vertical scroll.
This property is effectively a shortcut to the Y position of the WindowRect property.
description.jp:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the vertical scroll.
This property is effectively a shortcut to the Y position of the WindowRect property.

description.en:
A rectangle representing the portion of the map currently in view.
A rectangle at X=0, Y=0 with a Height and Width of 1 implies the entire plotting area is in view. A Height and Width of .5 would imply that the view is halfway zoomed in.
The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.
description.jp:
A rectangle representing the portion of the map currently in view.
A rectangle at X=0, Y=0 with a Height and Width of 1 implies the entire plotting area is in view. A Height and Width of .5 would imply that the view is halfway zoomed in.
The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.

description.en: Gets sets left position of the rectangle
description.jp: Gets sets left position of the rectangle

description.en: Gets sets top position of the rectangle
description.jp: Gets sets top position of the rectangle

description.en: Gets sets width position of the rectangle
description.jp: Gets sets width position of the rectangle

description.en: Gets sets height position of the rectangle
description.jp: Gets sets height position of the rectangle

description.en:
Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped.
Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer.
If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.
description.jp:
Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped.
Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer.
If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.

description.en: Defer the view update until after the user action is complete.
description.jp: Defer the view update until after the user action is complete.

description.en: Update the view immediately while the user action is happening.
description.jp: Update the view immediately while the user action is happening.
